resume.p: Hop on board of a small vessel, and embark for a journey to learn more about me. You can control the ship by pressing the down arrow key or by scrolling down the page.

project.p: This part of my website is getting old. I've learned a lot of new ways to improve my code and I would like to spend time to dig deeper in the mathematical aspect of creating the animation.

PTrans.p: Refactoring the previous mobile application for a student club. The app offers, to the club's clients, to buy fruits and vegetables from producers nearby. The club also need to contact producers in an easier way than sending messages with a mobile.

other.title: Hyblab 2022
other.description: Participation in Ouest Medialab's Hackaton. Follow Charlie on her journey in Bordeaux to discover more about abstention.

other.title: Galactic Inazuma Football Game
other.description: Trading Card Game centered around football. Collaboration with Anthime Huchet.

other.title: Strategy game AI
other.description: Artificial intelligence made to play the online game KDice, a Risk-like game.

other.title: PolyHash
other.description: Remake of Google Hash Code. Optimization of a smartphone factory's production chain.

other.title: S.P.E.E.D.
other.description: Submission to the third Blackthornprod Game Jam. Also made in collaboration with Anthime Huchet in a limited time.

other.title: Dodobius
other.description: First submission to Ludum Dare's Game Jam. We had 72 hours to create a whole video game as a team of 6.
